analyzed: atthi buddhānam buddhehi hīna atireka tā iti
translated: Is there a difference between Buddhas as to which is superior?

analyzed: na ha ivam vattabbe pe  sammappadhānataḥ pe  iddhipādataḥ

translated: “As to the bases of psychic power?”🔽“As to the faculties?”
“As to the powers?”🔽“As to the enlightenment factors?”🔽“As to mastery?”
“As to the knowledge and vision of freedom?”
“Is it so that it is not to be said that it is a person who is the same in the eye faculty and the eye consciousness?” …
The Discussion of the Buddha is finished.
